title: TSMC's Japan Play: AI Chip Market Reshaped

segments.text: TSMC is significantly expanding AI chip production capacity into Japan, marking a crucial strategic move for global supply chain diversification and resilience.
segments.image_prompt: Futuristic semiconductor manufacturing facility interior, robotic arms precisely placing wafers onto production lines, glowing blue data streams flowing across the scene, cinematic lighting.

segments.text: This CAPEX injection aims to mitigate geopolitical risks and leverage Japan's robust material suppliers, bolstering manufacturing yield and regional stability.
segments.image_prompt: Holographic 3D map of Japan with a highlighted region (e.g., Kumamoto), digital supply chain routes glowing neon green, superimposed with abstract data analysis, cyberpunk aesthetic, dramatic side lighting.

segments.text: The primary focus remains on advanced logic for high-bandwidth memory (HBM) and powerful GPUs, critical components driving the exploding AI market demand.
segments.image_prompt: Extreme close-up macro shot of a powerful GPU with integrated HBM stacks, intricate gold traces glowing subtly, reflecting digital code, dramatic side lighting, 8k resolution.
